name: Integrated Partners Group
description: Since 1996, Integrated Partners has been helping financial advisors to achieve their entrepreneurial vision. We offer comprehensive business building services, designed with the truly independent advisor in mind. With one hundred and forty-one advisors, one hundred and twenty-seven CPAs and forty regional offices across the United States, Integrated has built our reputation advisor by advisor, client by client.
Headline: OUR ADVISORS HAVE A SINGULAR FOCUS: OUR CLIENTS’ FINANCIAL WELL BEING
ShortDescription: Integrated Partners Group believe in empowering independent advisors to build the businesses they’ve always envisioned, while sharing a common goal – taking care of our clients.”

Highlights.name: Financial Advisor Support
Highlights.description: Integrated Partners offers a program that connects financial advisors with CPAs and attorneys. This suggests that they provide support services to financial advisors, potentially helping them better serve their clients.

Highlights.name: Empowering Financial Advisors
Highlights.description: The article states that Integrated Partners believes in empowering financial advisors to run their own businesses. This indicates that their program may focus on providing financial advisors with the tools and resources they need to be successful.

Highlights.name: Collaboration with CPAs and Attorneys
Highlights.description: A key aspect of Integrated Partners' program is connecting financial advisors with CPAs and attorneys. This collaboration likely allows financial advisors to offer more comprehensive financial services to their clients.

enhanced_description: Integrated Partners Group, established in 1996, empowers independent financial advisors to achieve their entrepreneurial vision by providing comprehensive business-building services. With a large network of 141 advisors, 127 CPAs, and 40 regional offices across the U.S., they facilitate collaboration among financial advisors, CPAs, and attorneys, enabling advisors to offer more comprehensive financial services to their clients. Their offerings include Retirement Planning, Investment Management, and Business Planning. While primarily focused on supporting financial advisors, the services are categorized under 'Total Rewards,' 'Corporate wellness software,' 'Health & safety providers,' 'Employee well-being,' and 'Employee benefits,' indicating that their financial planning expertise can contribute to improving employee happiness and engagement within client organizations.
key_use_cases: Supporting independent financial advisors in building and growing their businesses
Providing comprehensive financial planning services including retirement planning, investment management, and business planning to clients
Facilitating multidisciplinary collaboration between financial advisors, CPAs, and attorneys
Enhancing employee financial well-being and engagement as part of a total rewards or corporate wellness program
competitive_advantages: Extensive network of financial advisors, CPAs, and regional offices
Specialized focus on empowering independent financial advisors
Unique collaborative model connecting financial advisors with CPAs and attorneys for comprehensive client service
roi_benefits: Enabling financial advisors to achieve their entrepreneurial vision and build successful businesses
Helping clients achieve financial well-being through comprehensive financial services
Improving employee happiness and engagement for client organizations through financial wellness offerings
primary_users: HR professionals (seeking financial wellness benefits for employees)
